Introduction
This topic contains information on determining the number of days of VA benefits a Veteran must waive in order to remain entitled to drill pay, including
number of days reservists and members of the National Guard commonly receive drill pay
how Reserve and National Guard units calculate the number of days of drill pay to which a Veteran is entitled
travel time during drills/training
example of how to determine the number of days of VA benefits a Veteran must waive
, and
Veterans who receive pay for active duty training only
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A - Adjusting Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Benefits Based on a Veteran's Receipt of Drill Pay
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
